tpk::AzElRefSys

tpk::AzElRefSys Class Reference

#include <AzElRefSys.h>

Inheritance diagram for tpk::AzElRefSys:

[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Topocentric Az,El Reference System.

The zero-point of azimuth is the celestial intermediate pole and azimuth increases to the East.

Public Member Functions
